text.section:
Notwithstanding any other provision of this article, when a consumer orders a household good, the dealer shall provide to the consumer:
An estimated delivery date written clearly and conspicuously on any document evidencing the agreement of sale or lease for the household good; and
A statement that is part of or accompanies the document evidencing the agreement of sale or lease for the household good and is in boldface type of a minimum size of 10 points which is in substantially the following form:

The estimated delivery date shall take into account the manufacturer's or supplier's instructions, recent delivery experience with the manufacturer or supplier, and the dealer's own delivery schedules.
